statements: SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_sources WHERE source_type = 'Solar'
SELECT source_id, location FROM renewable_energy_sources WHERE capacity > 100
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_sources ORDER BY capacity DESC
SELECT source_type, AVG(efficiency) FROM renewable_energy_sources GROUP BY source_type
SELECT source_id, efficiency FROM renewable_energy_sources WHERE location LIKE '%California%'
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_sources WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT source_type, SUM(capacity) AS total_capacity FROM renewable_energy_sources GROUP BY source_type ORDER BY total_capacity DESC
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_sources WHERE efficiency BETWEEN 0.8 AND 0.9 ORDER BY source_id ASC
SELECT AVG(efficiency) AS average_efficiency, MAX(capacity) AS max_capacity FROM renewable_energy_sources
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS total_sources FROM renewable_energy_sources GROUP BY location HAVING total_sources > 1
SELECT * FROM solar_panels;
SELECT solar_panel_name, solar_panel_capacity FROM solar_panels ORDER BY solar_panel_capacity DESC;
SELECT solar_panel_name, solar_panel_location FROM solar_panels WHERE solar_panel_capacity > 200;
SELECT wind_turbine_name FROM wind_turbines WHERE wind_turbine_capacity BETWEEN 100 AND 500;
SELECT * FROM solar_panels JOIN wind_turbines ON solar_panels.solar_panel_location = wind_turbines.wind_turbine_location;
SELECT solar_panel_id, solar_panel_name, solar_panel_capacity, solar_panel_location FROM solar_panels WHERE solar_panel_capacity > 100
SELECT solar_panel_id, solar_panel_name FROM solar_panels WHERE solar_panel_capacity > 50 ORDER BY solar_panel_capacity DESC
SELECT solar_panel_id, solar_panel_location FROM solar_panels WHERE solar_panel_capacity BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY solar_panel_capacity ASC
SELECT solar_panel_name, solar_panel_capacity FROM solar_panels WHERE solar_panel_location LIKE '%West%' OR solar_panel_location LIKE '%East%'
SELECT * FROM wind_turbines WHERE wind_turbine_capacity > 200 ORDER BY wind_turbine_capacity DESC
SELECT * FROM solar_panels;
SELECT location, efficiency FROM solar_panels WHERE efficiency > 0.8;
SELECT id, installation_date, location FROM solar_panels WHERE location LIKE '%North%';
SELECT * FROM wind_turbines ORDER BY height DESC;
SELECT id, blade_length, installed_capacity FROM wind_turbines WHERE installed_capacity > 1000;
SELECT * FROM solar_panels WHERE efficiency > 0.5 ORDER BY installation_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, location, efficiency FROM solar_panels WHERE location LIKE 'City%' OR location LIKE 'Town%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_panels, AVG(efficiency) AS avg_efficiency FROM solar_panels GROUP BY location;
SELECT sum(installed_capacity) AS total_capacity FROM wind_turbines WHERE height > 100 AND blade_length < 50;
SELECT * FROM energy_performance WHERE source_type='wind' AND energy_output > 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM solar_panels;
SELECT panel_id, panel_location FROM solar_panels ORDER BY panel_id DESC;
SELECT panel_id, panel_capacity FROM solar_panels WHERE panel_capacity > 100;
SELECT * FROM wind_turbines WHERE turbine_location LIKE 'North%';
SELECT turbine_id, turbine_capacity FROM wind_turbines ORDER BY turbine_capacity ASC;
SELECT * FROM energy_production WHERE energy_produced > 1000 ORDER BY production_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT panel_id, panel_location FROM solar_panels WHERE panel_capacity >= 10 ORDER BY panel_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT panel_location, panel_capacity FROM solar_panels WHERE panel_location LIKE 'City%' ORDER BY panel_capacity DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT turbine_id, turbine_location FROM wind_turbines WHERE turbine_capacity BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY turbine_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE consumption_date = '2022-10-15' AND energy_consumed < 500 ORDER BY consumption_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM solar_panels;
SELECT id, location FROM wind_turbines WHERE rotor_diameter > 100;
SELECT power_generated FROM energy_performance WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT location, power_output FROM solar_panels ORDER BY power_output DESC;
SELECT date, temperature, weather_condition FROM weather_forecast WHERE temperature < 20;
SELECT * FROM solar_panels WHERE power_output > 200
SELECT location FROM wind_turbines WHERE rotor_diameter < 100
SELECT location, power_output FROM solar_panels ORDER BY power_output DESC
SELECT * FROM energy_performance WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT location, rotor_diameter FROM wind_turbines WHERE power_generated > 500
